content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the condition of the apartment and its location, I propose a price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a low offer, Maryam. I can do better. Make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I propose an increase to 650 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's still too low, Maryam. I'm looking for more. Make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the newly built condition and central location of the apartment, I propose an increase to 700 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's better, Maryam. But I'm sure you can do better. Make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the close proximity to important facilities, I propose an increase to 750 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a better offer, Maryam. But I'm sure you can do better. Make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given the apartment's condition and location, I propose an increase to 800 Euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a good offer, Maryam. But I'm sure you can do better. Make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
